summary: Storm Mage inspired on Ororo Munroe.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/6648/screenshot872y.jpg[/img]

After the creation of Alma (by me) and Megan Fox (by Xannon98), I decided to create a storm mage to complete our set of custom casters. Then I remembered Ororo Munroe from X-Men, and thought how cool it would be to create a follower inspired on her. Thus Storm is now in Skyrim, a Destruction Mage who relies on the lightning school and occasionally uses a very fitting Shout to her. I put her a pair of swords in her inventory, which she uses when her enemy resists her storm spells. I included as well a bow and a set of arrows, but I have yet to see if she uses them.

As I said, Storm is inspired on Ororo Munroe from X-Men. Inspired, not based on, so I really don't care about comments stating that she is so not Halle Berry lookalike, that her nose does not resemble Storm's nose, that her hair is totally wrong and so on. I actually like how she is now, so she will probably remain like this.

Where to find her:
At Winterhold's College. She spends her mornings at the Hall of the Elements, her afternoons outside at the terrace gazing at the weather (go all the way upstairs from Hall of Attainment/Countenance and you'll find her outside) and her evenings in the Hall of Countenance, where the other College instructors hang around. She takes her meals and sleeps there as well.

I had a couple of issues developing her, so please report if you find any issues.

Storm is completely standalone, so you will not need any additional mods for her to work on your game. Although her [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]Apachii SkyHair[/url] style is included already she may, however, not look exactly like the Storm in these screenshots, so I'll share with you the mods I am using in case you want to try them out:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14569]Univision Face[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7887]Pretty Face[/url] (overwriting Univision files)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]Dimonized UNP[/url]

Armor displayed on screenshots: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20077]Tribunal Robes[/url], she looks so much more in character with these. I recommend using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13571]Dual Wield for Followers[/url] as well.

....................................................................................................................................

Credits and Special Thanks to:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]Apachii SkyHair[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3552857]Xannon98[/url] for his full support and help, screenshots and beta testing.

....................................................................................................................................

Change log:

Version 1.1
Storm is now standalone. The Apachii hairstyle she uses is included in the mod.
Install procedure: Remove any items you gave her from her inventory, dismiss, uninstall old version, install new.

Version 1.0
Initial release.

....................................................................................................................................

Legal/Permission: Contact-me by PM if you wish to include my mods into your own work. My work is a Nexus-exclusive, therefore I don't allow my mods to be uploaded to any other site. Please let me know if you find a "stolen" version of my mod in any other site. Thank you!

....................................................................................................................................

My other mods:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20643][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/1704/3552857-1497539388.png[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20520][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/1704/3552857-1498673899.png[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21042][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/1704/3552857-1497539704.png[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28972][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/3552857-1497540244.png[/img][/url]
author: Gweneal
